name: Chaotic Beans New Update
description:
This game was made in 2 days as an "expansion" to the game Chaotic Beans. 

This game does not include the original 5 levels but expands upon them by procedurally generating arenas in which the exhilarating combat takes place. 

Fight off hordes of your favorite Chaotic Bean CHaracters in an all-new arcade style of gameplay. Much like the original, this game features three enemy stages. 

Red Beans, Blue Bonking Bois, and the infamous Green Beans. Who now will not only deal a hefty 100 damage in a single blow but are equipped with homing missiles that are targeted at you!

As this game was made in two days, there may be bugs you encounter.

Freshi, I hope You enjoy this game and it will inspire you to continue to expand the Chaotic Beans Universe.
